author: Simon Difford
description: I've made with rye whisky to deliver that spicy punch but others specify Irish whiskey. However, coffee is the hero in this Old Fashioned so your choice of coffee liqueur will have a bigger impact.
name: Coffee Old Fashioned
recipeIngredient: 40 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass
